tool.name: FileInfo
tool.description: Shows basic information about the file, such as data ranges and file type.
tool.command:
FileInfo
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_in_type: -in_type #if " " in str($param_in_type): "$param_in_type" #else $param_in_type #end if #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_out_tsv: -out_tsv $param_out_tsv #end if #if $param_m: -m #end if #if $param_p: -p #end if #if $param_s: -s #end if #if $param_d: -d #end if #if $param_c: -c #end if #if $param_v: -v #end if #if $param_i: -i #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_in_type
param.label: input file type -- default: determined from file extension or content

param.name: param_m
param.label: Show meta information about the whole experiment

param.name: param_s
param.label: Computes a five-number statistics of intensities, qualities, and widths

param.name: param_d
param.label: Show detailed listing of all spectra and chromatograms (peak files only)

param.name: param_c
param.label: Check for corrupt data in the file (peak files only)

param.name: param_v
param.label: Validate the file only (for mzML, mzData, mzXML, featureXML, idXML, consensusXML, pepXML)

param.name: param_i
param.label: Check whether a given mzML file contains valid indices (conforming to the indexedmzML standard)

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Shows basic information about the file, such as data ranges and file type.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_FileInfo.html
